Package utils

Class DBUtils

java.lang.Object
utils.DBUtils
public class DBUtils
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides methods for connecting to the database, query information and do needed modifications

    • addStartRentBikeRecord

      public static int addStartRentBikeRecord​(java.lang.String bikeBarcode) throws java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException
      Add a record of bike rental into database, leaving some fields for filling in the end of process
      Parameters:
      bikeBarcode - The bike to be rented
      Returns:
      ID of the rental, unique in the database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      EcoBikeException

    • addEndRentBikeRecord

      public static void addEndRentBikeRecord​(int rentID, int rentPeriod) throws java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException, java.text.ParseException
      Add end time of the rental and total rent time
      Parameters:
      rentID - the rental ID, provided by the addStartRentBikeRecord method
      rentPeriod - the rent period. This can be different from the duration between start and end time
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      EcoBikeException
      java.text.ParseException

    • addTransaction

      public static int addTransaction​(PaymentTransaction transaction, int rentID) throws java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException
      Add transaction associating to a rental to the database
      Parameters:
      transaction - transaction to be added
      rentID - rental ID associates to the transaction
      Returns:
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      EcoBikeException

    • saveRentPeriod

      public static void saveRentPeriod​(int rentID, int period) throws java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException
      Update time the bike is rented up current moment
      Parameters:
      rentID - The id of the rental
      period - rental time up to current moment
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      EcoBikeException

    • getCurrentRentPeriodOfBike

      public static int getCurrentRentPeriodOfBike​(java.lang.String bikeBarcode) throws java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException
      Get current rental time of a bike
      Parameters:
      bikeBarcode - the bike having rental time to be queried
      Returns:
      time rented in minute
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      EcoBikeException

    • getCurrentBikeRenting

      public static BikeTracker getCurrentBikeRenting​(Bike bike) throws java.sql.SQLException, EcoBikeException
      Get a bike tracker associate to a bike. This is useful for the case the application is restarted, when all trackers is deleted and connection to the database is reseted
      Parameters:
      bike - the bike to create tracker
      Returns:
      Tracker with rental information associate to the bike. The information is queried from the database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
      EcoBikeException
